pristyncare - Business Development Manager - Category

Location - Gurgaon, Work Type: Full Time

Support July 01, 2022

Responsibilities:

  • Directly impact revenue generation and consult patients about the service through structured discussions.
  • Understand Patient profiles & problems to explain the benefits of our services. Hand holding the patients throughout their journey for a better experience
  • Directly impact revenue generation by advising patients about the services through structured discussions and convincing them for surgeries.
  • Understanding a patient's profile and resolving their queries to make them better understand the benefits of Pristyn's services.
  • Being sensitive to a patient's needs and guiding them throughout their journey.
  • Coordinating with different departments and juggling multiple tasks to achieve the desired result.
  • Owning up the responsibility and able to plan weekly and monthly targets.

Job Requirements:

  • BTECH or Any graduate or MBA.
  • 2- 4 years of prior B2C business development experience
  • Should have worked in a target-based profile
  • Hustle & get things done attitude.
  • Be open to work in a crazily moving head start-up environment

About Us :-

Brief about Pristyn Care :

Pristyn Care is a Series-E Sequoia & Tiger global-funded Healthcare Startup. Founded by a team of Ex-Max & Vedanta Doctors & Ex-UrbanClap, Mobikwik folks. We are disrupting the surgical ecosystem. In 5 years, we aim to be the largest distributed (full stack) surgery platform in India.

A team of 2000 + today with folks from pedigree backgrounds, we are looking to bring onboard teammates who can bring in the hustle and problem-solving attitude to help build Pristyn into a formidable company.

Pristyn Care is focused on building a healthcare ecosystem delivering surgical care, hospital admission, doctor's consultation, pre and post-surgical follow-ups and hassle-free insurance claims.

We built an asset-light healthcare ecosystem of 70+ clinics and 300+ partner hospitals across 30+ cities. The platform claims to have over 90 in-house super-specialty surgeons with expertise in general surgery, ENT, urology, gynecology, Opthal, vascular, and cosmetic surgeries

Procedures are performed using advanced laser and laparoscopic techniques; we have successfully performed 10,000+ surgeries till date.
